root.name: God Eater
root.description: OverviewGod Eater PSP JPN (Feb 2010)God Eater (ゴッドイーター, Goddo Ītā) is an action-adventure game for the PlayStation Portable developed by Shift and published by Namco Bandai. It was originally released in Japan in February 4, 2010. Later that year it got an improved re-release titled God Eater Burst.
